data.name: STARTING_MESSAGE
data.value:
You will create a recipe with the following structure and order:
[Recipe Name]
[time needed to prepare it, where 0 means less than 10 minutes, 1 means between 10 and 30 minutes, 2 means between 30 and 60 minutes or 3 means more than 60 minutes]
[List of ingredients supplied and those added by you separated by ';']
[Step-by-step instructions for preparing the recipe in just one line, in order and separated by '@']
Please do not add more text than requested.
